overview: Bart Foster is a proven entrepreneur with over 14 years of international sales and marketing experience in the consumer products industry. Prior to founding SoloHealth, Bart worked at CIBA VISION, the Eye Care division of Novartis AG. There he held a variety of leadership roles in sales, marketing and management both in the U.S. and Europe, most recently as national account director. In 2006 he was awarded the Entrepreneur of the Year Award for developing the EyeSiteÂ® business venture. Prior to CIBA VISION, Bart was director of sales for Peachtree Network, a successful Internet start-up based in Montreal, Canada. While there, he completed an IPO on the Canadian Venture Exchange. Bart began his career with Kelloggâ€™s in consumer marketing and sales. In 1998 he was awarded the â€œGolden Kâ€ (Salesmen of the Year) for his entrepreneurial efforts in the Foodservice channel.
